CWEs: CWE-77: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection')
description: The function is vulnerable to command injection. The 'cmd' variable is constructed by concatenating user-controlled input ('opts.range[block]') into a command that is executed by the system. An attacker could potentially control the 'block' parameter to inject malicious commands, leading to arbitrary command execution on the server.
